title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Science Process Utilizing Learning Analytics and Self-Regulated Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze LMS data to identify their learning patterns and develop self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can design and execute balanced learning activities in collaborative and individual learning contexts.
Learners can interpret visual materials derived from learning analytics to predict and improve learning outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
